comments.body:
just question, if you want to accept nulls:
https://github.com/desandro/masonry/blob/master/dist/masonry.pkgd.js#L1684

Just noticed I forgot to add the docs link for this:
https://masonry.desandro.com/options.html#stagger

The above link describes this option. There also is the following sentence on top of the page:
> All options are optional, but columnWidth and itemSelector are recommended.
